resource.name: Disease Management Plan
resource.description:
The PlanDefinition for a rare conditions refers to PlanDefinitions of other diseases, 
i.e. Shwachman-Diamond Syndrome is typically associated with Neutropenia. The disease plan refers to 
medication, lab tests and other items for management of the disease.

resource.name: Lab Test Activity
resource.description: A Disease is associated with Symptoms, which may be abnormal lab values, represented by LOINC codes.

resource.name: Lab Test Observation
resource.description: A Disease is associated with Symptoms, which may be abnormal lab values, represented by LOINC codes.

resource.name: Rare Condition Management Plan
resource.description:
The PlanDefinition for a rare conditions refers to PlanDefinitions of other diseases, 
i.e. Shwachman-Diamond Syndrome is typically associated with Neutropenia. A code from Orphanet is required.
